champ:ChampionCrown.NAME: Champion's Crown
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter a Stance while not in one, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 this turn.

champ:BlackKnightHelmet.NAME: Black Knight's Helm
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you enter each Stance each combat: NL #bDefensive: Gain 2 Dexterity and lose 1 Strength. NL #yGladiator: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Strength. NL #rBerserker: Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.

champ:Barbells.NAME: Barbell
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least 3 non-Upgraded cards in your deck, #yUpgrade one at random.

champ:BerserkersGuideToSlaughter.NAME: Berserker's Guide to Slaughter
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the first 10 HP you lose on your turn each combat.

champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.NAME: Ultimate Champion's Crown
champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.FLAVOR: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat in Ultimate Stance, which lasts for 2 turns.

champ:DefensiveTrainingManual.NAME: Defensive Training Manual
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTechniques used in Defensive Mode generate 3 more #yCounter.

champ:DeflectingBracers.NAME: Deflecting Bracers
champ:DeflectingBracers.FLAVOR: If you thought blocking was good then...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the enemy round, gain #yCounter equal to your remaining Block.

champ:DuelingGlove.NAME: Dueling Glove
DESCRIPTIONS: After using a single-target Attack, if the target has no #yVulnerable, apply 1 #yVulnerable.

champ:FightingForDummies.NAME: Fighting for Dummies
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn while in no Stance, gain 6 Block.

champ:GladiatorsBookOfMartialProwess.NAME: Gladiators Book of Martial Prowess
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Technique, a Combo, a Finisher, and enter a Stance in the same turn, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity (chosen at random).

champ:PowerArmor.NAME: Power Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] . NL Your maximum Resolve and Counter is 15, and your maximum Hand Size is 8.

champ:SignatureFinisher.NAME: Signature Finisher
champ:SignatureFinisher.FLAVOR: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a Finisher. This Finisher never causes your turn to end or your stance to be exited.

champ:SpectersHand.NAME: Spectre's Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Technique while not in a Stance, add a Strike or Defend to your hand. It costs 0 and has Exhaust.

champ:LiftRelic.NAME: Inner Strength
champ:LiftRelic.FLAVOR: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

champ:ChampStancesModRelic.NAME: New Challenger
